thread.section_title: Play-Asia.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Play-Asia.com | www.play-asia.com | 14 of 325
thread.title: Tsutomu

author: Tsutomu
title: Tsutomu
text: There are many ways of purchasing Japanese video games and related products, but living in Australia, I choose Play-Asia.com. It is a real English-speaking business (not translated) and its Hong Kong location is advantageous for minimizing delivery time. The best thing, however, has been customer service. The times when I did have some trouble with an order, their response was prompt, personal and helpful.
